body.name: NutriChef 8" Fry Pan With Lid - Small Skillet Nonstick Frying Pan With Lid, Silicone Handle, Ceramic Coating, Blue Silicone Handle, Stain-Resistant And Easy To Clean, Professional Home Cookware
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 5 hrs 54 mins
features: MADE TO LAST: Made from 2.5mm aluminum with induction base and a tempered glass lid, this fry pan will surely prove its longevity even after years of use. It also features a thick non-stick coating. Its total dimensions are 14.5" x 8.5" x 3"

COOKTOP COMPATIBILITY: The pots, pans, and skillets are safe and compatible with gas, electric, and ceramic cooktops so you can cook your food however you like. It is also food-grade safe with an environmentally friendly construction.

QUALITY FRYING PAN: Become a better cook in the house with this frying pan as it effectively distributes and retains heat so you can cook your food evenly. Great for making fried food, sautéing, or for simply making breakfast scrambled eggs

STYLISH MODERN KITCHEN COOKWARE DESIGN: Cook with style as this pan is made with a stylish modern look in mind. Meant to be professional home kitchenware, this also features comfortable cool-touch form-fitting handle grips for your convenience

EASY TO CLEAN: Featuring a durable and long-lasting non-stick ceramic coating, cleaning this pan will be less hassle as any food particles will easily slip from the pan's surface. Wash this pan with dishwashing liquid and simply rinse with water
body.description: Features: - Professional Home Kitchenware - Stylish Modern Kitchen Cookware Design - Small Skillet Fry Pan - See-Through Tempered Glass Lid - Stain-Resistant & Easy-to-Clean - Food-Grade Safe, Environmentally Friendly Construction - Durable & Long-Lasting Non-Stick Coating - Comfortable Cool-Touch Form-Fitting Handle Grips - Effectively Distributes & Retains Heat for Even Cooking All-Around - Pots & Pans Safe for Gas, Electric, Ceramic & Counter Cooktops - PFOA Free What's in the Box: - 8'' Fry Pan with Lid - Blue Silicone Handle Technical Specs: - Max Temperature: 350° Fahrenheit (177° Celsius), Except Glass Lid - Construction Material: 2.5mm Aluminum with Induction Base - Handle Material: SS Sheet /Wire with Silicone Handle, Rivet Install - Lid: Tempered Glass Lid with Rivet - Interior Coating: Non-stick Ceramic Coating - Coating Hardness: 1-2 Level HB - Fry Pan Size (L x W x H): 14.5'' x 8.5'' x 3'' –inches

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: STYLISH MODERN KITCHEN COOKWARE DESIGN Cook with style as this pan is made with a stylish modern look in mind. Meant to be professional home kitchenware, this also features comfortable cool-touch form-fitting handle grips for your convenience. COOKTOP COMPATIBILITY The pots, pans, and skillets are safe and compatible with gas, electric, and ceramic cooktops so you can cook your food however you like. It is also food-grade safe with an environmentally safe construction. EASY TO CLEAN Featuring a durable and long-lasting non-stick ceramic coating, cleaning this pan will be less hassle as any food particles will easily slip from the pan's surface. Wash this pan with dishwashing liquid and simply rinse with water.
NCFRLD10 NCFRLD14 NCFRLD8 Material Ceramic Ceramic Ceramic Product Dimensions 10 x 10 x 10 inches 10 x 10 x 10 inches 10 x 10 x 10 inches Item Weight 5.09 pounds 10.13 pounds 3.15 pounds

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love this pan, so far it’s wonderful to cook in and cleaning is a breeze. You will need to have space to store it or hang it like I did. It’s an attractive color so hanging it looks great

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great everyday pan.
reviews.reviewText: Fantastic pan for the very reasonable price. Sturdy, lid fits well, handle well made. Works great. FYI, don't wash in dish washer, super easy to hand wash.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This pan is great. It heats evenly and cooks everything perfectly. Cleanup is also a breeze

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Worth the money.
reviews.reviewText: I use this frypan often. It's the perfect size and has a glass lid too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks like solid construction. No stick works.
reviews.reviewText: Bought this to replace a 3-4 year to old pan of the same size. This one is working as advertised for non stick. The lid is a big plus for us.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great size for breakfast omelet and non stick.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Huge, like really big.
reviews.reviewText: Shipping was fast and on time. The skillet is really pretty, if indeed a skillet can be pretty. Lovely blue nonstick interior and silver on the outside. Large handle with a helper handle on the other side. 14 inches on a stove is a lot of skillet. Make sure you realize just how big that is. My daughter loves it. She is cooking for nine people at the moment and now she is not having to cook in small batches in a skillet that was rapidly becoming difficult to clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Non stick not so much
reviews.reviewText: I’ve had the pan less than 30 days and the center of the pan discolored and now everything sticks. Always been hand washed with nothing abrasive. Never had metal cooking utensils used on it. Only butter and olive oil was ever used to cook with, never cooking spray. Was washed as instructed before first use.Really wish it lasted longer since it is hard to find a large pan with lid that is also compatible with an induction range.

reviews.reviewTitle: Wanted large frying pan with lid.
reviews.reviewText: Pan was a Christmas gift. We used it Christmas Eve for the first time. It works Great, it is large that’s what we were looking for when we have at large group for dinner. Worked as advertised non stick worked Great.

reviews.reviewTitle: This is thee best frying pan ever!!
reviews.reviewText: Everything slides right out, perfect for eggs, bacon, stews n sauces. Its huge, has a heavy lid, cleans soooo easily. Ships in a big box that protects the pan/lid very well. I LOVE this pan! Especially the cool touch rubber handles on the pan and the lid! Buy this already 🤗😊
Pricey but this fry pan is the best. Truly non stick. Easy to clean. The lid even fits some of my potsWill buy other sizes when I find them on sale.
Originally sourcing a lid then found this combo, a bit heavy and so far no other complaints, good cooking tool.

I have used this fry pan for over a month now. It is the best! It cooks perfectly and is SO easy to clean. I have read reviews that the finish comes off but I never put any pans in the dishwasher - always wash by hand. I would (and have) highly recommend this fry pan.
